# 安装

参考安装章节

# 引入咕噜UI

import { Button } from "gulu-ui"
import "gulu-ui/dist/index.css"

export default {
  name: 'app',
  components: {
    "g-button": Button
  }

# 添加CSS样式

*, *::before, *::after{ box-sizing: border-box; }

← 安装 Button 按钮 →
